content:
As an AI language model, I can provide you with some examples of games that were created using GrimE. GrimE was created by LucasArts and was initially used to create the game "Grim Fandango" in 1998. "Grim Fandango" is a classic point-and-click adventure game that is widely considered to be one of the best adventure games of all time.

Another popular game created using GrimE is "Escape from Monkey Island," also made by LucasArts. The game was released in 2000 and is a sequel to the popular Monkey Island series. 

Apart from these games, GrimE has been used to create other adventure games like "The Longest Journey," "Dreamfall," and "Dreamfall Chapters." GrimE has also been used for prototyping various other games, some of which were never released.

Overall, GrimE has a rich history of use in the game development industry, and it continues to be used by developers today to create innovative and immersive experiences.
